name: SUN_FOV
description: Direct  Sun  correction  has  been  performed  during  image reconstruction of this pixel

name: SUN_GLINT_FOV
description: Reflected  Sun  correction  has  been  performed  during  image reconstruction of this pixel

name: MOON_FOV
description: Direct  Moon  correction  has  been  performed  during  image reconstruction of this pixel

name: SINGLE_SNAPSHOT
description: Scene has been combined with an adjacent scene in opposite polarisation during image reconstruction to account for cross-polarisation leakage

name: SUN_POINT
description: Pixel is located in a zone where a Sun alias was reconstructed (after Sun removal, measurement may be degraded)

name: SUN_GLINT_AREA
description: Pixel is located in a zone where Sun reflection has been detected

name: MOON_POINT
description: Pixel  is  located  in a zone where a Moon alias was reconstructed (after Moon removal, measurement may be degraded)

name: AF_FOV
description: Pixel is inside the exclusive zone of Alias free (delimited by the six aliased unit circles)

name: BORDER_FOV
description: Pixel is close to the border delimiting the Extended Alias free zone

name: SUN_TAILS
description: Pixel is located in the hexagonal alias directions centred on a Sun alias (if Sun is not removed, measurement may be degraded in these directions)

name: RFI_H_POL
description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in H polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

name: RFI_V_POL
description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in V polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

name: RFI_2
description: If set, the measurement is affected by point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (flag is set in a circle around the RFI position, with a radius dependant on the RFI expected BT defined in the AUX RFILST), or it has exceeded the threshold defined in BT_Dual/Full_RFI_Pixel_Flag_Threshold fields in AUX CNFL1P, or is negative for Dual Polarisation values

name: RFI_3
description: If set, the measurement is affected by the tails of a point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (tail width is dependant on the RFI estimated BT (from each snapshot measurements) , corresponding to 0.16 of the radius of the RFI circle flagged)
